name: degradingly
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that causes people to feel that they have no value: For some children this experience must be degradingly inhumane. They were, and sometimes still are, treated quite degradingly.
More examplesFewer examplesIf deported, they would be at significant risk of being degradingly treated or punished.He claimed he had been degradingly stripped by force.The brand's latest advert has been called out for being degradingly sexist.It is an offence to the dignity of workers to pay them such degradingly low wages.
